channel.title: SMF 99 Subtype 14 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 99 Subtype 14 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - affinity_nodes_rebuild
item.description: rebuild affinity nodes Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: vcm_flag1 Description rebuild affinity nodes Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field vcm_flag1.

item.title: Field - an_cap
item.description: capacity of affinity node in microseconds Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CAP Description capacity of affinity node in microseconds

item.title: Field - an_ci_flags
item.description: Flags Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_FLAGS Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description an_ci_notopoinfo 0 No CPU/Core topology information available in SMF99E_AN_TOPO

item.title: Field - an_ci_nl1
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 1 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_NL1 Description Container ID of nesting level 1

item.title: Field - an_ci_nl2
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 2 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_NL2 Description Container ID of nesting level 2

item.title: Field - an_ci_nl3
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 3 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_NL3 Description Container ID of nesting level 3

item.title: Field - an_ci_nl4
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 4 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_NL4 Description Container ID of nesting level 4

item.title: Field - an_ci_nl5
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 5 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_NL5 Description Container ID of nesting level 5

item.title: Field - an_ci_nlinuse
item.description: Number of highest nesting level in use in array SMF99E_AN_CI_NL. 0 = there is no container information available in SMF99E_AN_CI_NL Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CI_NLINUSE Description Number of highest nesting level in use in array SMF99E_AN_CI_NL. 0 = there is no container information available in SMF99E_AN_CI_NL

item.title: Field - an_ci_notopoinfo
item.description: No CPU/Core topology information available in SMF99E_AN_TOPO Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: an_ci_flags Description No CPU/Core topology information available in SMF99E_AN_TOPO Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field an_ci_flags.

item.title: Field - an_flags
item.description: flags Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_FLAGS Description flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_an_bdycrossing 0 CPs on this node are boundary crossing. vcm_an_hnsbdycrossing 1 Helper nodes are boundary crossing.

item.title: Field - an_polarhi
item.description: Number of VHs in this affinity node Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_POLARHI Description Number of VHs in this affinity node

item.title: Field - an_polarlow
item.description: Number of VLs in this affinity node Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_POLARLOW Description Number of VLs in this affinity node

item.title: Field - an_polarmed
item.description: Number of VMs in this affinity node Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_POLARMED Description Number of VMs in this affinity node

item.title: Field - cp_cap
item.description: CPU/Core capacity in microseconds Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_CAP Description CPU/Core capacity in microseconds

item.title: Field - cp_ci_flags
item.description: Flags Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_CI_FLAGS Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cp_ci_notopoinfo 0 No CPU/Core topology information available in SMF99E_CP_TOPO

item.title: Field - cp_ci_nl1
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 1 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_CI_NL1 Description Container ID of nesting level 1

item.title: Field - cp_ci_nl2
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 2 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_CI_NL2 Description Container ID of nesting level 2

item.title: Field - cp_ci_nl3
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 3 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_CI_NL3 Description Container ID of nesting level 3

item.title: Field - cp_ci_nl4
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 4 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_CI_NL4 Description Container ID of nesting level 4

item.title: Field - cp_ci_nl5
item.description: Container ID of nesting level 5 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_CI_NL5 Description Container ID of nesting level 5

item.title: Field - cp_ci_nlinuse
item.description: Number of highest nesting level in use in array SMF99E_CP_CI_NL. 0 = there is no container information available in SMF99E_CP_CI_NL Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_CI_NLINUSE Description Number of highest nesting level in use in array SMF99E_CP_CI_NL. 0 = there is no container information available in SMF99E_CP_CI_NL Post-Processed The source values (SMF) are mapped in IBM SMF Explorer as follows: Source value IBM SMF Explorer meaning 0 STISI_15_1_20 1 STISI_15_1_2 2 STISI_15_1_3 3 STISI_15_1_4 4 STISI_15_1_4 default STISI_15_1_5

item.title: Field - cp_ci_notopoinfo
item.description: No CPU/Core topology information available in SMF99E_CP_TOPO Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: cp_ci_flags Description No CPU/Core topology information available in SMF99E_CP_TOPO Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field cp_ci_flags.

item.title: Field - cp_cputype
item.description: CPU/Core type Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_CPUTYPE Description CPU/Core type Post-Processed The source values (SMF) are mapped in IBM SMF Explorer as follows: Source value IBM SMF Explorer meaning 0 CP 5 zIIP default unknown

item.title: Field - cp_misc
item.description: CPU/Core misc. info Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_MISC Description CPU/Core misc. info Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description polar_n2 7 polarization infromation polar_n1 6 polarization infromation

item.title: Field - cp_nl1
item.description: Not available Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_NL1 Description Not available

item.title: Field - cp_nl2
item.description: Not available Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_NL2 Description Not available

item.title: Field - cp_polar
item.description: CPU/Core polarization Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: cp_misc Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cpu_type
item.description: CPU/Core type Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_AN_CPUTYPE Description CPU/Core type Post-Processed The source values (SMF) are mapped in IBM SMF Explorer as follows: Source value IBM SMF Explorer meaning 0 CP 5 zIIP default unknown

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99DTE

item.title: Field - dln
item.description: Length of the data section Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99DLN Description Length of the data section

item.title: Field - dof
item.description: Offset to the data section from the beginning of the record (including RDW) Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99DOF Description Offset to the data section from the beginning of the record (including RDW)

item.title: Field - don
item.description: Number of data sections Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99DON Description Number of data sections

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: Date when the record was moved into the SMF buffer, in the form 0cyydddF. Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99DTE Description Date when the record was moved into the SMF buffer, in the form 0cyydddF.

item.title: Field - e_cp_polar
item.description: CPU/Core polarization Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_CP_POLAR Description CPU/Core polarization

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: System indicator: Bit 0 reserved, Bit 1 subtypes utilized, Bit 2 reserved, Bits 3-6 version indicators, Bit 7 reserved Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99FLG Description System indicator: Bit 0 reserved, Bit 1 subtypes utilized, Bit 2 reserved, Bits 3-6 version indicators, Bit 7 reserved Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description stu 1 Subtypes utilized

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_cpu_index
item.description: Logical CPU/Core number Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_INDEX Description Logical CPU/Core number

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_cpu_length
item.description: Length of processor data section Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_LENGTH Description Length of processor data section

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_cpu_number
item.description: Number of processor data sections Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_NUMBER Description Number of processor data sections

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_cpu_offset
item.description: Offset to processor data section Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_OFFSET Description Offset to processor data section

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_hdr_length
item.description: Length of header data section Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_LENGTH Description Length of header data section

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_hdr_number
item.description: Number of header data sections Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_NUMBER Description Number of header data sections

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_hdr_offset
item.description: Offset to header data section Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_OFFSET Description Offset to header data section

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_mpwq_cpu_index
item.description: MPWQ CPU/Core Number Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_CPU_INDEX Description MPWQ CPU/Core Number

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_mpwq_hnode_length
item.description: Length of MPWQ HNODE data section Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_HNODE_LENGTH Description Length of MPWQ HNODE data section

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_mpwq_hnode_number
item.description: Number of MPWQ HNODE data sections Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_HNODE_NUMBER Description Number of MPWQ HNODE data sections

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_mpwq_hnode_offset
item.description: Offset to MPWQ HNODE data section Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_HNODE_OFFSET Description Offset to MPWQ HNODE data section

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_mpwq_length
item.description: Length of MPWQ data section Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_LENGTH Description Length of MPWQ data section

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_mpwq_node_index
item.description: MPWQ Node Number Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_HNODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_NODE_INDEX Description MPWQ Node Number

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_mpwq_number
item.description: Number of MPWQ data sections Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_NUMBER Description Number of MPWQ data sections

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_mpwq_offset
item.description: Offset to MPWQ data section Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_OFFSET Description Offset to MPWQ data section

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_node_index
item.description: Node number Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_INDEX Description Node number

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_node_length
item.description: Length of node data section Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_LENGTH Description Length of node data section

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_node_number
item.description: Number of node data sections Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_NUMBER Description Number of node data sections

item.title: Field - hd_topochg_node_offset
item.description: Offset to node data section Map: SMF99_S14_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF9914_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_OFFSET Description Offset to node data section

item.title: Field - high
item.description: None Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: polar_n1, polar_n2 Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return polar_n1 & polar_n2

item.title: Field - honor_priority_change
item.description: honor priority has changed Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: vcm_flag1 Description honor priority has changed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field vcm_flag1.

item.title: Field - len
item.description: Record Length. This field and the next field (total of four bytes) form the RDW (record descriptor word). Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99LEN Description Record Length. This field and the next field (total of four bytes) form the RDW (record descriptor word).

item.title: Field - low
item.description: None Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: polar_n1, polar_n2 Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return polar_n1 & polar_n2

item.title: Field - medium
item.description: None Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: polar_n1, polar_n2 Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return polar_n1 & polar_n2

item.title: Field - mpwq_affinity_node
item.description: affinity node this CPU/Core belongs to Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_MPWQ_AFFINITY_NODE Description affinity node this CPU/Core belongs to

item.title: Field - mpwq_book_crossing_index
item.description: book crossing index Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_HNODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_MPWQ_BOOK_CROSSING_INDEX Description book crossing index

item.title: Field - mpwq_contcrossindex_nl1
item.description: Container crossing index of nesting level 1 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_HNODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_MPWQ_CONTCROSSINDEX_NL1 Description Container crossing index of nesting level 1

item.title: Field - mpwq_contcrossindex_nl2
item.description: Container crossing index of nesting level 2 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_HNODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_MPWQ_CONTCROSSINDEX_NL2 Description Container crossing index of nesting level 2

item.title: Field - mpwq_contcrossindex_nl3
item.description: Container crossing index of nesting level 3 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_HNODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_MPWQ_CONTCROSSINDEX_NL3 Description Container crossing index of nesting level 3

item.title: Field - mpwq_contcrossindex_nl4
item.description: Container crossing index of nesting level 4 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_HNODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_MPWQ_CONTCROSSINDEX_NL4 Description Container crossing index of nesting level 4

item.title: Field - mpwq_contcrossindex_nl5
item.description: Container crossing index of nesting level 5 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_HNODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_MPWQ_CONTCROSSINDEX_NL5 Description Container crossing index of nesting level 5

item.title: Field - mpwq_help_nodes
item.description: Array of helper nodes of this aff.node. Only the first 44 helper nodes are supported. Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_HNODE_MAP Array Length: 44 Based on: SMF99E_MPWQ_HELP_NODES Description Array of helper nodes of this aff.node. Only the first 44 helper nodes are supported.

item.title: Field - mpwq_highestcontcross
item.description: The highest container crossing for Cores assigned to this node Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_HNODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_MPWQ_HIGHESTCONTCROSS Description The highest container crossing for Cores assigned to this node

item.title: Field - mpwq_share
item.description: CPU/Core share Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_MPWQ_CPU_MAP Based on: SMF99E_MPWQ_SHARE Description CPU/Core share

item.title: Field - pflg
item.description: Record flags Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99PFLG Description Record flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description record_incomplete 0 Only a subset of the available data was written to avoid that this record gets larger than 32 kByte reasm_indicator 1 Only a subset of the available data is written to this record. The rest follows in subsequent records. This record contains a reassembly area.

item.title: Field - pln
item.description: Length of the product section Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99PLN Description Length of the product section

item.title: Field - pnm
item.description: Product Name - SRM Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99PNM Description Product Name - SRM

item.title: Field - pof
item.description: Offset to the product section from the beginning of the record (including RDW) Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99POF Description Offset to the product section from the beginning of the record (including RDW)

item.title: Field - polar_n1
item.description: polarization infromation Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: cp_misc Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field cp_misc.

item.title: Field - polar_n2
item.description: polarization infromation Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: cp_misc Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field cp_misc.

item.title: Field - pon
item.description: Number of product sections Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99PON Description Number of product sections

item.title: Field - processor
item.description: processor type Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_MAP Based on: high, medium, low Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: high_filter = ~high medium_filter = ~medium low_filter = ~low processor = high.where(high, '') processor = processor.where(high_filter, 'High') processor = processor.where(medium_filter, 'Medium') processor = processor.where(low_filter, 'Low') return processor

item.title: Field - reasm_indicator
item.description: Only a subset of the available data is written to this record. The rest follows in subsequent records. This record contains a reassembly area. Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: pflg Description Only a subset of the available data is written to this record. The rest follows in subsequent records. This record contains a reassembly area. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field pflg.

item.title: Field - record_incomplete
item.description: Only a subset of the available data was written to avoid that this record gets larger than 32 kByte Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: pflg Description Only a subset of the available data was written to avoid that this record gets larger than 32 kByte Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field pflg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: Record type 99 Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99RTY Description Record type 99

item.title: Field - rvn
item.description: Record Version Number Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99RVN Description Record Version Number

item.title: Field - sdef_len
item.description: Length of self definition section Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99_SDEF_LEN Description Length of self definition section

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: Segment descriptor (see record length field) Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99SEG Description Segment descriptor (see record length field)

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: System identification (from the SID parameter). Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99SID Description System identification (from the SID parameter).

item.title: Field - slv
item.description: System level from which record was cut (copied from CVTPRODN) Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99SLV Description System level from which record was cut (copied from CVTPRODN)

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name from which record was cut (copied from CVTSNAME) Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99SNM Description System name from which record was cut (copied from CVTSNAME)

item.title: Field - speed_change
item.description: processor speed change Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: vcm_flag1 Description processor speed change Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field vcm_flag1.

item.title: Field - ssid
item.description: Sub System Identification Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99SSID Description Sub System Identification

item.title: Field - stu
item.description: Subtypes utilized Record: SMF99S14 Based on: flg Description Subtypes utilized Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - tid
item.description: Record subtype (must be at offset ‘16’X) Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99TID Description Record subtype (must be at offset ‘16’X)

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF99S14 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: Time since midnight, in hundreths of a second, that the record was moved into the SMF buffer Record: SMF99S14 Based on: SMF99TME Description Time since midnight, in hundreths of a second, that the record was moved into the SMF buffer

item.title: Sample - topology
item.description: Request topology information per processor. Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format vcm_lparphysprocshrprocessed SMF99E_VCM_LPARPHYSPROCSHR LPAR physical processor share for general CPUs/Cores scaled by 256 integer processorvirtual high medium low processor type cp_ci_nl5 SMF99E_CP_CI_NL5 Container ID of nesting level 5 integer cp_ci_nl1 SMF99E_CP_CI_NL1 Container ID of nesting level 1 integer cp_ci_nl4 SMF99E_CP_CI_NL4 Container ID of nesting level 4 integer hd_topochg_cpu_index SMF99E_HD_TOPOCHG_CPU_INDEX Logical CPU/Core number integer cp_cputypeprocessed SMF99E_CP_CPUTYPE CPU/Core type integer affinity_nodes_rebuildvirtual vcm_flag1 rebuild affinity nodes topology_changevirtual vcm_flag1 topology has changed cp_ci_nlinuseprocessed SMF99E_CP_CI_NLINUSE Number of highest nesting level in use in array SMF99E_CP_CI_NL.

item.title: Field - topology_change
item.description: topology has changed Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: vcm_flag1 Description topology has changed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field vcm_flag1.

item.title: Field - vcm_an_bdycrossing
item.description: CPs on this node are boundary crossing. Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: an_flags Description CPs on this node are boundary crossing. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field an_flags.

item.title: Field - vcm_an_hnsbdycrossing
item.description: Helper nodes are boundary crossing. Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: an_flags Description Helper nodes are boundary crossing. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field an_flags.

item.title: Field - vcm_an_nl1
item.description: Not available Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_VCM_AN_NL1 Description Not available

item.title: Field - vcm_an_nl2
item.description: Not available Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_NODE_MAP Based on: SMF99E_VCM_AN_NL2 Description Not available

item.title: Field - vcm_ceccapvalid
item.description: CEC capacities are valid Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: vcm_flag2 Description CEC capacities are valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field vcm_flag2.

item.title: Field - vcm_cpsperan
item.description: CPUs/Cores per affinity node Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99E_VCM_CPSPERAN Description CPUs/Cores per affinity node

item.title: Field - vcm_currtopo_tod
item.description: Timestamp of the STSI returned SYSIB 15.1.x information which is currently used by HiperDispatch Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99E_VCM_CURRTOPO_TOD Description Timestamp of the STSI returned SYSIB 15.1.x information which is currently used by HiperDispatch

item.title: Field - vcm_errorcode
item.description: VCM error code Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99E_VCM_ERRORCODE Description VCM error code

item.title: Field - vcm_flag1
item.description: balancer interval flag1 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99E_VCM_FLAG1 Description balancer interval flag1 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description topology_change 0 topology has changed affinity_nodes_rebuild 1 rebuild affinity nodes honor_priority_change 2 honor priority has changed wuq_error 3 dispatcher WUQ error speed_change 4 processor speed change

item.title: Field - vcm_flag2
item.description: balancer interval flag2 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99E_VCM_FLAG2 Description balancer interval flag2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description vcm_ceccapvalid 0 CEC capacities are valid vcm_lparcapvalid 1 LPAR capacities are valid vcm_old_state 2 old VCM state vcm_mpwq_updated 4 dispatcher affinity was updated vcm_ptf_switched 5 PTF was issued to initiate a switch opposite mode. However, the PTF return info tells us that we are already in the requested mode vcm_transition 6 VCM in transition to/from vertical

item.title: Field - vcm_hwlevel
item.description: HW level Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99E_VCM_HWLEVEL Description HW level

item.title: Field - vcm_lparcapvalid
item.description: LPAR capacities are valid Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: vcm_flag2 Description LPAR capacities are valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field vcm_flag2.

item.title: Field - vcm_lparphysprocshr
item.description: LPAR physical processor share for general CPUs/Cores scaled by 256 Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99E_VCM_LPARPHYSPROCSHR Description LPAR physical processor share for general CPUs/Cores scaled by 256 Post-Processed The value is scaled by 256.

item.title: Field - vcm_maxaffinityindex
item.description: Maximum affinity index the system supports for the life of the IPL Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99E_VCM_MAXAFFINITYINDEX Description Maximum affinity index the system supports for the life of the IPL

item.title: Field - vcm_maxcpuidforipl
item.description: Maximum CPU ID/Core ID the system supports activating for the life of the IPL Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99E_VCM_MAXCPUIDFORIPL Description Maximum CPU ID/Core ID the system supports activating for the life of the IPL

item.title: Field - vcm_mpwq_updated
item.description: dispatcher affinity was updated Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: vcm_flag2 Description dispatcher affinity was updated Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field vcm_flag2.

item.title: Field - vcm_old_state
item.description: old VCM state Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: vcm_flag2 Description old VCM state Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field vcm_flag2.

item.title: Field - vcm_ptf_switched
item.description: PTF was issued to initiate a switch opposite mode. However, the PTF return info tells us that we are already in the requested mode Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: vcm_flag2 Description PTF was issued to initiate a switch opposite mode. However, the PTF return info tells us that we are already in the requested mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field vcm_flag2.

item.title: Field - vcm_smf_sequ
item.description: balancer interval sequence number Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: SMF99E_VCM_SMF_SEQU Description balancer interval sequence number

item.title: Field - vcm_transition
item.description: VCM in transition to/from vertical Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: vcm_flag2 Description VCM in transition to/from vertical Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field vcm_flag2.

item.title: Field - vn2
item.description: Record sub version. Used to identify changes to the record in the service stream Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99VN2 Description Record sub version. Used to identify changes to the record in the service stream

item.title: Field - wuq_error
item.description: dispatcher WUQ error Map: SMF99_S14_HD_TOPOCHG_HDR_MAP Based on: vcm_flag1 Description dispatcher WUQ error Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field vcm_flag1.
